section.title: val_occurs
section.para: This rule property is used with the val_isPresent rule property to specify the exact number of times a string must be present in the target text. When this rule property is not used, then the string must be present in the target text at least once.
For example, the following is valid:
section.programlisting: <unit id="1"> <val:validation> <val:rule isPresent="loja" occurs="2" /> </val:validation> <segment id="1"> <source>Choose a store option in the online store.</source> <target>Escolha uma opção de loja na loja online.</target> </segment> </unit> { "id": "1", "kind": "unit", "val_validation": [ "isPresent": "loja", "occurs": 2 ], "subunits": [ { "id": "1", "kind": "segment", "source": [ { "text": "Choose a store option in the online store." } ], "target": [ { "text": "Escolha uma opção de loja na loja online." } ], } ] }

<unit id="1"> <val:validation> <val:rule isPresent="loja" occurs="2" /> </val:validation> <segment id="1"> <source>Choose a store option in the online store.</source> <target>Escolha uma opção de loja na online store.</target> </segment> </unit> { "id": "1", "kind": "unit", "val_validation": [ "isPresent": "loja", "occurs": 2 ], "subunits": [ { "id": "1", "kind": "segment", "source": [ { "text": "Choose a store option in the online store." } ], "target": [ { "text": "Escolha uma opção de loja na online store." } ], } ] }
section.para: Value description: an integer value of 1 or greater.
